Title: Maintains the continued viability of the state's existing biomass facility which is located within a military installation
Summary: Maintains the continued viability of the state's existing biomass facility which is located within a military installation by deeming such facility a renewable energy system within the renewable energy program established by the public service commission by its order adopting or modifying the clean energy standard.
ActClause: AN ACT to maintain the continued viability of the state's existing biomass facility which is located within a military installation
